externalInformation.information: pages 12-13 (Professor Melville Schachter, MSc MD CM (1920-2000); died in London on May 18; graduate of McGill University; assistant professor in the Department of Physiology at Dalhousie University; joined the National Institute of Medical Research at Mill Hill, London in 1950; in 1954 joined University College, London as Lecturer and later Reader in Physiology; returned to Canada in 1965 to become Professor and Head of the Department of Physiology at the University of Alberta, retiring in 1986)
title page (Melville Schachter, B.Sc.; McGill University)
